approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description via a text input field and submitting it. The task description should be stored.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks. Each task in the list should show its text description.

requirements.title: Fast Loading
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The time taken for the initial page load should be minimized to provide a responsive user experience.

requirements.title: Secure Application
requirements.description: The application shall be secure, protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access. This includes, but is not limited to, protecting against common web vulnerabilities.
